issue.title: [Rust] Add README and executable files to parquet
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4160](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4160). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is to create a separate README for the parquet sub-crate, as well as executables such as `parquet-read`, `parquet-schema`, that people can install via `cargo install`.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4160?focusedCommentId=16734964) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3314
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3314>
